contextPlaceholder: e.g., Saigon street at night, neon lights
locationPlaceholder: e.g., Eiffel Tower, Ben Thanh Market
actionPlaceholder: e.g., looking thoughtfully into the distance
creativeSpaceDesc: Your content will appear here once generated.
loadingMessage: The AI is creating, please wait a moment...
loadingPromptMessage: The AI is thinking of a prompt, please wait...
errorNoFaceImage: Please upload a reference face image.
errorInvalidResponse: Did not receive a valid response from the model.
errorNoImageReturned: The model did not return an image.
analyzeImagePrompt: Upload an image to analyze its context
analysisError: Could not analyze the image. Please try again.
videoRequestPlaceholder: Describe the scene or select a suggestion...
videoSafetyError: Your video request violated the safety policy. Please revise the scene description and try again.
videoLoadingMessage: The AI is directing your film. This process can take a few minutes. Please do not leave this page.
loadingVideoPromptMessage: The AI is writing the script, please wait...
imageQuotaNoteText: If the app runs out of quota, generate a prompt and copy it to
videoQuotaNoteText: If you run out of quota, generate a video prompt and copy it to
createGuideStep1: Upload a 'Face Image' (required) for the AI to composite into the result.
createGuideStep2: (Optional) Upload a 'Context Image' for the AI to draw inspiration for composition, lighting, and style.
createGuideStep3: Customize parameters. Click 'Generate Prompt' for the AI to write a detailed description; you can preview and edit this prompt.
createGuideStep4: Click 'Generate Image' to start. If you have generated and edited a prompt, this button will automatically use your latest prompt.
analyzeGuideStep1: Upload any picture for the AI to 'read' and understand its content.
analyzeGuideStep2: Click 'Analyze'. The AI will return details like theme, action, and gender. You can click 'Swap Gender' for the AI to rewrite the description.
analyzeGuideStep3: Once satisfied, click 'Load Context' to automatically fill this information into the 'Create' tab, ready for creation.
videoGuideStep1: Upload the 'Face Image' and select the 'Gender' for the character in your video.
videoGuideStep2: In the 'Video Request' box, enter a short idea (e.g., 'a knight in a dense forest').
videoGuideStep3: Click 'Suggest'. The AI will develop your idea into 3 detailed scenarios. Click on the one you like to select it.
videoGuideStep4: With the selected scenario, click 'Generate Video Prompt' to see the technical prompt, or 'Generate Video' to start rendering (this takes a few minutes).
contactForFeedback: For feedback or new feature requests, contact:
genderSwapError: Could not swap gender. Please try again.
statsError: Could not load stats. Please check your Google Script configuration.
gatekeeperUnauthorized: Please respect the developer's work. Use the original application, do not copy it.
